channel.title: Strat's Tools and Toys on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Strat's Tools and Toys on Strat

item.title: Marcus Aurelius' Meditations Explorer
item.description: If you’d like to explore through Marcus Aurelius’s Meditations, easily sharing any interesting ones you find, here you go.

item.title: Wordle Helper
item.description: A tool to help you play wordle, a pretty mediocre word game (try Knotwords instead).

item.title: Breakfast Restaurant Names Generator
item.description: Eggscrement? Eggscruciating? Eggsecution? You get the idea.

item.title: Infinite Randomized Steam Queue
item.description: Have you ever wanted to scan through every single game on Steam? Your dream has become a reality. Enjoy.

item.title: Paranoia Randomizer
item.description: A tool to help play Paranoia over the internet.

item.title: PS2 Game Dumpster Diver
item.description: The PS2 was a cool console

item.title: Cocktail Menu QR Code
item.description: A QR code linking directly to my cocktail menu.

item.title: Cocktail Bucket List
item.description: Cocktails I want to make some day.

item.title: Everyone is John and/or George
item.description: Everyone is John tabletop roleplaying rules.

item.title: Miscellaneous Links
item.description: A bunch of links. What did you expect?

item.title: Music
item.description: Some bad music I made one day.
